blogPost.excerpt: StockHound is an intelligent stock out watchdog 🐶 for Shopify Stores. StockHound forecasts the stock out date of each product and sends the list of products that are about to run out of stock. It’s a simple and effective solution for a complex problem.
blogPost.body: StockHound is an intelligent stock out watchdog 🐶 for Shopify Stores. StockHound forecasts the stock out date of each product and sends the list of products that are about to run out of stock. It’s a simple and effective solution for a complex problem.
blogPost.title: StockHound by Fabrikatör - Free stock out forecast reports for Shopify stores
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: StockHoundはShopify Storeのためのインテリジェントな在庫切れ監視員🐶です。StockHoundは、各商品の在庫切れの日付を予測し、在庫切れになりそうな商品のリストを送信します。複雑な問題をシンプルかつ効果的に解決してくれます。
localize.tagline: Shopifyストア用の無料在庫切れ予測レポート

localize.description: StockHound是一个为Shopify商店提供的智能出库监控🐶。StockHound预测每个产品的缺货日期，并发送即将缺货的产品列表。这是一个复杂问题的简单而有效的解决方案。
localize.tagline: 为Shopify商店免费提供缺货预测报告

localize.description: StockHound是一個爲Shopify商店提供的智能出庫監控🐶。StockHound預測每個產品的缺貨日期，併發送即將缺貨的產品列表。這是一個複雜問題的簡單而有效的解決方案。
localize.tagline: 爲Shopify商店免費提供缺貨預測報告
